SELECT_THE_ACTION: Select the action you want to carry out.
LOADING_ACTION: Please wait while the requested action loads.

MANAGE_THIS_MESSAGE.PIN_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: Pin this message on this channel.
MANAGE_THIS_MESSAGE.UNPIN_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: Unpin this message from this channel.

MISCELLANEOUS_ACTIONS.SHOW_USER_AVATAR_DESCRIPTION: Show the avatar of this user.

MODERATE_THIS_USER.PERMANENTLY_BAN_THIS_USER_DESCRIPTION: Permanently ban this user from the server.
MODERATE_THIS_USER.KICK_THIS_USER_DESCRIPTION: Kick this user from the server.
MODERATE_THIS_USER.PERMANENTLY_MUTE_THIS_USER_DESCRIPTION: Permanently mute this user from the server.
MODERATE_THIS_USER.SOFTBAN_THIS_USER_DESCRIPTION: Softban this user from the server.
